bike.description: Fuji A2-SL custom butted Aluminum with PowerCurve down tube, Tri shaped top tube, Oversized seat tube and Integrated tapered head tube, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: Fuji A2-SL, custom butted Aluminum with Edge S-bend MonoStay, Cold forged dropout with CNC D disc mount and replaceable hanger

Wellgo ATB w/steel cage, toe clips and straps
Shimano XT SGS Shadow Top normal, 10sp

Fuji Custom 1 1/8" - 1 1/2" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
